data.title: Imbiza Journal Vol 1 Issue 1
data.meta_description: Imbiza Journal Vol 1 Issue 1 - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is the table of contents for Issue 1, Volume 1 of the Imbiza Journal for African Writing. It lists over 20 articles, essays, short stories, poems and other creative works by African authors. The articles cover topics like permission to thrive as an artist, Masoja Msiza's poetry and acting career, Fred Khumalo's writing career, encounters in libraries, changing lives through books, and decolonizing fiction.
